title: Gozonji! Gekkou Kamen-kun
synopsis: Gekkou Kamen is retired on the moon, so his trusty motorbike returns to Earth to find a new hero to take over the job of defending the Earth from alien invaders.
staff: [['Takeuchi, Yoshio', ['Director']], ['Fujiyama, Fusanobu', ['Sound Director']], ['Suzuki, Yoshio', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Rooky', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
